name: licensethis
tagline: Choose an OSS license for your project with ease.
body:
licensethis =========== Choose an OSS license for your project with ease. Usage ----- `$ licensethis []` Commands -------- `help`
Show this help text. `list`
Show a list of all available OSS licenses. `info`
Show more information for a license. `generate`
Generate LICENSE.txt file in current folder after asking for author name. Examples -------- `$ licensethis help`
Show help text. `$ licensethis info mit`
Show more information for MIT license. `$ licensethis generate mit`
Generate MIT license text file in current directory. CONTRIBUTORS ------------ - Hasit Mistry
Personal: [hasit.github.io](http://hasit.github.io/)
Github: [hasit](https://github.com/hasit) - Anuj Deshpande
Personal: [anujdeshpande.com](http://www.anujdeshpande.com/)
Github: [anujdeshpande](https://github.com/anujdeshpande/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
